org.easybatch.jdbc

Class JdbcRecordMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.jdbc.JdbcRecordMapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the target domain object type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordMapper<T>

    public class JdbcRecordMapper<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordMapper<T>
    A RecordMapper that maps database rows to domain objects.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Constructor Detail

      • JdbcRecordMapper

        public JdbcRecordMapper(java.lang.Class<? extends T> recordClass)
        Constructs a default JdbcRecordMapper instance. Column names will be fetched from the jdbc result set meta data and set to fields with the same name of the target object.
        Parameters:
        recordClass - the target domain object class
